sentence.Network_en: She ran a brothel in Soho.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... hostel 旅店 brothel 妓院 tunnel 隧道，坑道.
青字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 青龙〖 blackdragon〗 青楼〖 brothel〗 青庐〖 blackclothtent〗.
勾_百度百科 ... 勾践[ Gou Jian] 勾栏，勾阑[ house of ill fome;brothel;wholehouse] 勾勒[ draw the outline of;bring out].
听电影《返老还... ... 1.be meant to 打算；有意要；注定 3.brothel 妓院；窑子；堂子 4.life being what it was 人生无常；生命的意义.

list.abs: I could also realize the bar was a brothel ., 我也可以了解酒吧是一个妓院.

brothels always offer sexual intercourse while many parlors opt to provide a range of sexual services , most typically masturbation by the masseuse or masseur .妓院总是提供性交，而许多按摩院选择提供性服务的范围，最通常由女按摩师或按摩师自慰。
冶,冶字的解释,查字典 ... 冶容[ seductive looks] 冶游[ frequent brothels] 冶铸[ smelt metal and cast utensils].
brothel owner wants his own church ., 妓院老板要建立自己的教堂.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (originally brothel-house): from late Middle English  brothel 'worthless man, prostitute', related to Old English  brēothan 'degenerate, deteriorate'

entry.def: A brothel is a building where men can go to pay to have sex with prostitutes.

means.word_mean: 1. a building where prostitutes are available
